page.title: 01TITLE PAGE
page.content: Our rectangle{No.04320384}comprises of Lydgate, Endcliffe Edge, Greystones, Ecclesall, Brincliffe, Broomhill, Sharrow, Highfield, Lowfield, Carfield, Nether Edge and Moorfoot. Main features are: Endcliffe Hall, Hallamshire & Nether Edge Hospitals, Polytechnic and its College of Art department, Sheffield United Football Club, The Moor and Ecclesall shopping areas, Radio Sheffield, Midland Railway Station, General Cemetery, Mount Pleasant Centre and University Halls of Residence. The area stretches from Inner City small terraced houses, businesses and shops with multicultural populations to suburban housing with larger homes and gardens. The whole interspersed with parks namely Meersbrook,Endcliffe,Bingham and the Botanical Gardens.
